Projects

Mini Project I sem 5th
Decentralised Freelancing Website
September 2019 -- October 2019
Desktop application to eliminate 3rd Party from Freelancing
Peer to Peer communication between Client and Freelancer
Application built using Ethereum Blockchain,HTML,CSS

Mini Project II sem 6th
Multimedia Encryption using Hybrid Cryptography Approach
January 2020 -- March 2020
Implementation of a system capable of encryption and decryption of multimedia data(Text,Images,Video,Audio)
Hybrid model based on the amalgamation of symmetric encryption techniques such as AES and asymmetric techniques such as ECC
This is an application made using Django and NodeJs
